mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product(category, pname, pcontent, pwriter, readcount, regdate, moddate) values (#{category}, #{pname}, #{pcontent}, #{pwriter}, 0, now(), now())
mapper.select: select pno, pname, regdate, pwriter from tbl_product order by pno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_product set category=#{category}, pname=#{pname}, pcontent=#{pcontent}, pwriter=#{pwriter}, moddate=now() where pno=#{pno}
